resource.description: A module that has been registered in the CloudFormation registry as the default version

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the module version to set as the default version.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the module version to set as the default version.

properties.name: ModuleName
properties.description: The name of a module existing in the registry.

type.description: The name of a module existing in the registry.

properties.name: VersionId
properties.description: The ID of an existing version of the named module to set as the default.

type.description: The ID of an existing version of the named module to set as the default.
